name: Jooin's Romance Fantasy
description:
Game Description



In my next life, I want to live in a world full of cute girls...
Welcome to the chaotic romance fantasy adventure presented by virtual streamer "Lee Jooin" and his fans, the "Churros"!

This game is an RPG Maker creation where "Lee Jooin" personally crafted the scenario, featuring simple controls and a highly immersive story. Unlike typical dating sims, the target to conquer is only one. Additionally, resembling pixel art-based visual novels, the game stands out with a faster and more concise story, along with plans for full dubbing.

Create a game dedicated to the fans, and enjoy this creation made to leave memories with them!

Game Features


Unprecedented Story : A regression story unfolds as an accident suddenly brings about romance with a favorite VTuber in a different world.
Easy Controls : An interface accessible to all age groups, ensuring easy access and enjoyment.
Good Accessibility : A short and light story with included combat scenes.
Full Dubbing Support Planned : Virtual streamer Lee Jooin will personally provide game dubbing in upcoming updates.

Synopsis


I was born into an ordinary household in South Korea, leading a simple life—getting a regular job, complaining about work, just an ordinary person.

Tired after work, while heading home, my supervisor approached.

"Hey, Manager Kim, isn't Manager Kim joining the company dinner?"
"Sigh..."

Feeling low, unable to watch the regular broadcast, my tension drops even further. Despite my bad mood, I decide to leave a comment on Lee Jooin's YouTube.

"I've already seen it all... Should I write something interesting in the comments?"

Contemplating, I walk towards the dinner venue...

(Car brake sound)

"What's this, wha..t.."

Bam!

I couldn't see the approaching car and got hit by a truck.

"Ah..."

Something flows from my head.

Ugh, I did want to be reincarnated into another world, but I didn't expect it to happen like this...

If possible, please let my next life be born in a place filled with cute girls...

System Requirements


Operating System : Windows 7/8/10
Processor : Intel Core i3 or higher
Memory : 2 GB RAM
Graphics : DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 compatible GPU
Storage : Minimum 1 GB available space
